system.description:
The knowledge you have gathers uncovers ever more dangerous secrets that you may turn against those who oppose your designs.  You gain the following benefits:

  • As an action you may expend a hit die to regain 1d4+1 spell points.  Once you have done so you cannot do so again until you finish a short or long rest or critically succeed on an intelligence based skill check.
  • You may choose to instead expend 3 spell points instead anytime a scholar ability requires you to expend a hit die, or 5 anytime a scholar ability requires you to spend inspiration.
  • Half your scholar level counts towards your warlock level for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.0q5qeigzy5bv2zrq]{Extra Blast} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.gndmzgng98w9k3jq]{Eldritch Evolution} abilities.
